short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Voice-to-Text Anywhere in Chrome with OpenAI Whisper API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open any website. Hold "Alt" (or option key for Mac) and start talking. Then, paste the transcription anywhere you want.

https://github.com/alireza29675/whisper-anywhere
